answers.answer: Yes same thing happened to me I never had allergies in my life I went to the dr. Right away cuz i got scared and it's allergies. So annoying
You can take benedryl and zyrtec. Those are the 2 I took before pregnancy and my doctor told me both are safe. I occasionally take them.
That can be a very serious symptom of preeclampsia, I would suggest getting checked out by your doctor or at the very least phoning them
Call your dr.puffy face could be a sign of something wrong.
Well it didn't happen yesterday or today so I'm pretty sure it was just allergies since I had a stuffy nose and watery eyes too
It's probably nothing, I wake up with a swollen face after eating alot of salt and not drinking enough water... talk to ur doctor to double check, I think ull be fine....

question: I woke up this morning and when I looked in the mirror my face was really swollen and my nose was really stuffy.. Couple hours later it went down but my eyes are still pretty puffy.. I've never had allergies or anything before I got pregnant but could I have gotten them??
title: swollen face?
